Empath watches Night Shade leave.  "I think she can be trusted," she 
remarks to Galvatron once the new Predacon is out of earshot.  
"Unlike Cygnar."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "lady_night_shade04" <lady_night_shade04@y...> 
wrote:
> "Of corse, my lord." Bows and leaves.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> > "Excelent. Please you must be drained from the crash. Go rest for 
> now and 
> > then Ill have you brainstorm with quilldart on some defensive 
> weapon upgrades 
> > and the like."
